name: Paper Wireframe Kit
description:
Figma Community Awards 2022

Paper Kit was a finalist in the Figma Community Awards! Thanks to all who showed their support and voted!


What's New‚ú®

May 3, 2022

  • Improved component naming
  • More organized Component page
  • Brand new palette of accent colors for you to choose from, based on Crayola colors (for your inner childüñç).
  • Removed "ghost" page. Don't ask.


About Paper Kit

Jump into your next project and generate concepts quickly with this Lo-Fi wireframing kit.


Inspired by the analog process of paper prototyping, each component has been crafted to take a backseat to the overall experience you're aiming to create.


As Method's first published resource on Community, we're excited to see what you'll do with this simple kit. Created by both designers and strategists in-house, Paper Kit will help you zoom out, work quickly, and collaborate more effectively with your cohorts ‚ú®


About Method

Method is a diverse team of strategists, designers, and engineers.


We believe that good technology improves our daily lives in ways that few things can. We exist to inspire and enable those wanting to create exceptional software and digital experiences. üëâFollow us on Figma Community!
